title: Mandalorian Season 3 Preorders Get Much-Needed $26 Price Cut At Amazon
description: The Mandalorian: Season 3 Collector's Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray) $50 (was $76) Preorder at Amazon Preorder at Walmart Ahsoka: Season 1 Collector's Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray) $52.46 (was $76) Preorder at Amazon Preorder at Walmart Hawkeye: Season 1 Collector's Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray) $52.46 (was $76) Preorder at Amazon Preorder at Walmart Loki: Season 2 Collector's Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray) $52.46 (was $76) Preorder at Amazon Preorder at Walmart The Mandalorian Season 3's Collector's Edition Steelbook is now available to preorder for only $50, which is probably a relief for fans hoping to complete their Mandalorian 4K Blu-ray collection. Previously priced at $76 at Amazon, The Mandalorian Season 3 was the last of the four upcoming Disney Originals on 4K Blu-ray to receive a price cut. Collector's Edition Steelbooks for Ahsoka Season 1, Hawkeye Season 1, and Loki Season 2 dropped to $52.46 at Amazon and Walmart earlier this week. All four of the upcoming Star Wars and Marvel Collector's Editions release December 3.Just like the first two waves of Disney+ physical releases, they will only be available in this collectible steelbook format and are bundled with three art cards. But there is one notable difference with these 4K releases: audio. These will be the first of Disney's Marvel and Star Wars series to support 4K Ultra HD Dolby Vision and Atmos Audio. Additionally, Disney isn't releasing 1080p Blu-ray editions this time; all previous releases in this series included 4K and standard Blu-ray versions.Continue Reading at GameSpot
excerpt: Like the first two waves of Disney+ Star Wars and Marvel steelbook releases, you can expect these to be extremely popular this holiday season.

html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

The Mandalorian Season 3's Collector's Edition Steelbook is now available to preorder for only $50, which is probably a relief for fans hoping to complete their Mandalorian 4K Blu-ray collection. Previously priced at $76 at Amazon, The Mandalorian Season 3 was the last of the four upcoming Disney Originals on 4K Blu-ray to receive a price cut. Collector's Edition Steelbooks for Ahsoka Season 1, Hawkeye Season 1, and Loki Season 2 dropped to $52.46 at Amazon and Walmart earlier this week. All four of the upcoming Star Wars and Marvel Collector's Editions release December 3.

Just like the first two waves of Disney+ physical releases, they will only be available in this collectible steelbook format and are bundled with three art cards. But there is one notable difference with these 4K releases: audio. These will be the first of Disney's Marvel and Star Wars series to support 4K Ultra HD Dolby Vision and Atmos Audio. Additionally, Disney isn't releasing 1080p Blu-ray editions this time; all previous releases in this series included 4K and standard Blu-ray versions.

Disney+ Steelbook Collector's Edition Preorders

Note: The new Star Wars and Marvel Disney Originals releases went up for preorder on October 31. Amazon's listings for all four of the upcoming releases started at $86 before being adjusted to $76 within hours. As of November 6, the prices for all four have (thankfully) dropped considerably at Amazon and Walmart.

With preorder price guarantees at Amazon and Walmart, you won't be charged until your order ships and the price will automatically be adjusted to the lowest price offered from the time you order until release. But keep in mind the price could potentially go back up.

  • The Mandalorian: Season 3 (4K Blu-ray) -- $50 ($76) | Also at Walmart
  • Ahsoka: Season 1 (4K Blu-ray) -- $52.46 ($76) | Also at Walmart
  • Hawkeye: Season 1 (4K Blu-ray) -- $52.46 ($76) | Also at Walmart
  • Loki: Season 2 (4K Blu-ray) -- $52.46 ($76) | Also at Walmart

Disney+ Collector's Edition Steelbooks are, rather unsurprisingly, very popular. Last year's holiday releases repeatedly sold out ahead of launch, so if you're interested in completing your Mandalorian or Loki collection, or picking up the debut seasons of Ahsoka or Hawkeye, we'd recommend preordering as early as possible. This is especially true if you're aiming to gift any of these 4K Blu-rays this holiday.

Here's a closer look at the Collector's Edition Steelbook releases of The Mandalorian Season 3, Ahsoka Season 1, Hawkeye Season 1, and Loki Season 2. At the bottom of this article, you'll find a complete list of the Star Wars and Marvel 4K Blu-ray and Blu-ray Collector's Edition Steelbooks in the Disney+ lineup. We also created an Amazon hub with all 12 of the 4K Collector's Editions.

Ahsoka: Season 1 Collector's Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray)

$52.46 (was $76)

Ahsoka: The Complete First Season includes all eight episodes on 4K Blu-ray and the following featurettes:

  • Ahsoka: Legacy - Cast and crew discuss the creation of the series.
  • Path of the Apprentice - Explores the dynamic between Anakin and Ahsoka
  • Ghosts of the Past - Background on Ahsoka's allies: Sabine, Hera, Ezra, and Chopper
  • Darkness Rising - Background on the villains in the series

Loki: Season 2 Collector's Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray)

$52.46 (was $76)

Loki fans can finally own the second season on 4K Blu-ray. Season 1 was part of the first wave of Disney+ 4K releases last year. Season 2 ran for six episodes last fall, so it was surprising to see it wasn't included in the group of spring releases that launched in April.

Here's a list of featurettes and other bonus content included with the 4K Blu-ray:

  • Loki Through Time - featurette chronicling the last decade for Loki
  • Assembled: The Making of Loki Season 2
  • Gag Reel
  • Deleted/Extended Scenes

Loki hasn't been renewed for a third season, so it's possible the full series is the 12-episode arc, six in each season.

Loki Series

  • Loki: Season 1 (4K Blu-ray) -- $45 ($86)
  • Loki: Season 2 (4K Blu-ray) -- $52.46 ($76)
  • Loki: Season 1 (Blu-ray) -- $40 ($76)

Disney started releasing its Marvel and Star Wars TV series on 4K Blu-ray last holiday season with four releases, including the first two seasons of The Mandalorian. In April, the second group of four arrived. Considering this new batch of four features the same style of steelbook art and are bundled with three art cards like all previous releases, it's probably safe to assume Disney will add to this collection again in the future.

Here's a look at all of the Disney Originals from a galaxy far, far away and the MCU to collect. All of the links below are for Amazon listings, with the exception of the few marked as sold out. Walmart has those in stock, though, so the full collection of Disney Originals Star Wars and Marvel Steelbooks are available and discounted.

All Star Wars 4K Steelbook Collector's Editions

  • The Mandalorian: Season 1 (4K Blu-ray) -- $56 ($86)
  • The Mandalorian: Season 2 (4K Blu-ray) -- $45 ($86)
  • The Mandalorian: Season 3 (4K Blu-ray) -- $50 ($76)
  • Ahsoka: Season 1 (4K Blu-ray) -- $52.46 ($76)
  • Andor: Season 1 (4K Blu-ray) -- $45 ($86)
  • Obi-Wan Kenobi: Complete Series (4K Blu-ray) -- $86

All Star Wars Standard Blu-ray Collector's Editions

  • Obi-Wan Kenobi: Complete Series (Blu-ray) -- $66 ($76)
  • Andor: Season 1 (Blu-ray) -- $57 ($76) | sold out at Amazon
  • The Mandalorian: Season 1 (Blu-ray) -- $40 ($76)
  • The Mandalorian: Season 2 (Blu-ray) -- $40 ($76)

All Marvel 4K Steelbook Collector's Editions

  • Hawkeye: Season 1 (4K Blu-ray) -- $52.46 ($76)
  • Loki: Season 1 (4K Blu-ray) -- $45 ($86)
  • Loki: Season 2 (4K Blu-ray) -- $52.46 ($76)
  • The Falcon and the Winter Soldier (4K Blu-ray) -- $48 ($86)
  • WandaVision: Season 1 (4K Blu-ray) -- $45 ($86) | sold out at Amazon
  • Moon Knight: Season 1 (4K Blu-ray) -- $45 ($86) | sold out at Amazon

All Marvel Standard Blu-ray Collector's Editions

  • The Falcon and the Winter Soldier (Blu-ray) -- $34 ($76)
  • WandaVision: Season 1 (Blu-ray) -- $40 ($76)
  • Moon Knight: Season 1 (Blu-ray) -- $40 ($76)
  • Loki: Season 1 (Blu-ray) -- $40 ($76)
